mapper.sql: T.ID AS "id", T.CREATE_DATE AS "createDate", T.CREATE_USER AS "createUser", T.UPDATE_DATE AS "updateDate", T.UPDATE_USER AS "updateUser", T.DEL_FLAG AS "delFlag", T.NAME AS "name", T.URL AS "url", T.METHOD AS "method", T.PARAMETER AS "parameter", T.RETURN_VALUE AS "returnValue", T.EXCLUDES AS "excludes", T.CATALOG_ID AS "catalogId", T.SEQUENCE AS "sequence", T.TYPE AS "type"

sql.where:
1=1
AND T.ID LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%'
AND T.CREATE_DATE < #{createDate}
AND T.CREATE_USER LIKE '%'||#{createUser}||'%'
AND T.UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}
AND T.UPDATE_USER LIKE '%'||#{updateUser}||'%'
AND T.DEL_FLAG LIKE '%'||#{delFlag}||'%'
AND T.NAME LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%'
AND T.URL LIKE '%'||#{url}||'%'
AND T.METHOD LIKE '%'||#{method}||'%'
AND T.PARAMETER LIKE '%'||#{parameter}||'%'
AND T.RETURN_VALUE LIKE '%'||#{returnValue}||'%'
AND T.EXCLUDES LIKE '%'||#{excludes}||'%'
AND T.CATALOG_ID LIKE '%'||#{catalogId}||'%'
AND T.SEQUENCE LIKE '%'||#{sequence}||'%'
AND T.TYPE LIKE '%'||#{type}||'%'

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) total FROM BO_INTERFACE_DESC T
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BO_INTERFACE_DESC (
DEL_FLAG, NAME, URL, METHOD, PARAMETER, RETURN_VALUE, EXCLUDES, CATALOG_ID, SEQUENCE, TYPE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, ID ) VALUES (
#{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{excludes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catalogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sequence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser.userName}, sysdate, #{id} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE BO_INTERFACE_DESC
DEL_FLAG=#{delFlag},
NAME=#{name},
URL=#{url},
METHOD=#{method},
PARAMETER=#{parameter},
RETURN_VALUE=#{returnValue},
EXCLUDES=#{excludes},
CATALOG_ID=#{catalogId},
SEQUENCE=#{sequence},
TYPE=#{type},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser.userName}, UPDATE_DATE = sysdate, ID = #{id}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM BO_INTERFACE_DESC WHERE id IN
#{listId}
